tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SponsorshipAgreements (
    agreement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sponsor_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    agreement_date DATE,
    contract_value DECIMAL,
    brand_integration TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SponsorshipAgreements (
    sponsorship_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sponsor_name VARCHAR(255),
    sponsor_contact VARCHAR(255),
    sponsorship_amount DECIMAL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE BrandIntegrations (
    integration_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_name VARCHAR(255),
    integration_type VARCHAR(50),
    integration_description TEXT,
    show_date DATE,
    approval_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE SponsorshipAgreements (
	sponsorship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	sponsor_name VARCHAR(255),
	sponsorship_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
	sponsored_event VARCHAR(255),
	sponsorship_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE BrandIntegrations (
	integration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	brand_name VARCHAR(255),	
	event_included VARCHAR(255),
	integration_type VARCHAR(50),
	integration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Partnerships (
	partner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	partner_name VARCHAR(255),
	partner_type VARCHAR(50),
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Sponsorships (
    sponsorship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sponsor_name TEXT,
    sponsorship_amount DECIMAL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE BrandIntegrations (
    integration_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    brand_name TEXT,
    integration_type TEXT,
    integration_description TEXT,
    integration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE FashionShows (
    show_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_name TEXT,
    show_date DATE,
    location TEXT,
    organizer TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE SponsorshipAgreements (
    agreement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sponsorship_id INT,
    integration_id INT,
    agreement_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (sponsorship_id) REFERENCES Sponsorships(sponsorship_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (integration_id) REFERENCES BrandIntegrations(integration_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Partnerships (
    partnership_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sponsor_id INT,
    show_id INT,
    agreement_id INT,
    partnership_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (sponsor_id) REFERENCES Sponsorships(sponsorship_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (show_id) REFERENCES FashionShows(show_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (agreement_id) REFERENCES SponsorshipAgreements(agreement_id)
);
